name: Riches and Railroads
description:
https://tabletopia.com/playground/riches-and-railroads-ughij7/play-now

The gold rush has brought many prospective businesses and companies to the California hills. Mining corporations are fighting to claim land for their base of operations and with less and less space available they are resorting to devious tactics. Some are even going so far as to build into each other's rail systems and steal their resources. With everyone’s hearts set on getting piles upon piles of gold, the question remains, who will get the most gold before it's all gone?

This is a four-player rail building game where each player is a mining corporation at the start of the gold rush and each player is rushing to make the most money.
